text: Talkback is a Philippine interactive current affairs-talk show television program broadcast on the ABS-CBN News Channel (ANC) every Monday at 7:30 pm, and hosted by Karmina Constantino. It aims to provide audiences a broader perspective of news and current events, and elicit real-life, real-time feedback, questions and insights from viewers. ==Hosts== ===Current=== *Karmina Constantino (2017–present) ===Substitute=== *Christian Esguerra ===Former=== *Tina Monzon-Palma (2000–2017) ==See also== *ABS-CBN News and Current Affairs *List of programs shown on the ABS-CBN News Channel ==References== ==External links== * Category:2000 Philippine television series debuts Category:ABS-CBN News Channel original programming Category:English- language television shows Category:Philippine television talk shows
title: Talkback (TV program)
